TopicTitle: What would you like to see out of a portal 3?

Articles.Content:
Well, it's been a while since portal 2 was released. It was a great series i personally enjoyed it a lot, So in the season of Easter and the day of this discussion/poll, I'd like to see what you guys would like to see in a portal 3?

I personally would like to see a new character introduced as Chell as been beating GLaDOS for a while now and portal 2 ended in the final battle i guess (Wasn't able to finish portal 2). So i'd like to see a new person being tested by GLaDOS or some other AI.

Another thing i'd like to see in a portal 3 is when you shoot all cameras in a chamber in a certain chamber you unlock a secret door to an Easter egg or a portal gun before you get one in the story.

My last few things i'd love to see in a portal 3 is an inventory, Like you can keep cubes and stuff so when you walk through the emancipation grids they don't get destroyed, Another thing is random test malfunctions like the AI would be talking and it would speed the sentence then the lights would flash and a portal would open either helping or not helping you, Always being a secondary route if it was to happen. In the pole i'll have some different suggestions, You vote on what one you'd like to see best!

Happy launching! Bearsh inc.
